title: Could anyone help me ID this sample?
content:
Someone said it was Castellar but it doesn’t look quite the same.  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905034108im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Sample_4357.png)

 [‹ Shackamaxon Country Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905034108/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43900 "Go to previous forum topic") [Under Construction Display Font - Any Ideas? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905034108/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43907 "Go to next forum topic")
author: -A Hound for Ba...

comments.content:
Hi Nicolaus,

that’s [Imprint Shadow](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905034108/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/imprint/mt-shadow/).  
By the way: ‘EIAONGSR’ – what language is that, Elvish? ;-p  
F

Thank you so much.  
It’s not elvish, but I’m hoping to use it in scrabble soon. I’ll have to doctor my dictionary.

–Nic
